resources.string: Note: If you have no screen lock, Android refuses to store the security settings!
This small helper app creates a wlan connection entry for the Selfnet WLAN. It configures the correct SSL CA and subject name match, making it a little more secure than a hand-created entry.
If you face any issues connecting to the WLAN please check whether you typed in your password and email address correctly. If this doesn\'t help contact support@selfnet.de.
Email-Address ends with whitespace - Please change that

You should now have a wifi connection entry with correct security settings and certificate verification. \n\nIf you are facing problems to connect to the WiFi check whether you provided the correct credentials. This message only confirms that the profile has been created it doesn\'t validate you username and password.
Please provide your WiFi credentials from MySelfnet.
